mapper.select: SELECT me.`id` AS id, me.`name` AS NAME, me.`url` AS url, me.`path` AS path, me.`css`, me.`createTime` AS createTime, p.`id` AS pId, p.`name` AS pName, p.`url` AS pUrl, p.`path` AS pPath, p.`css` AS pCss FROM sys_menu me LEFT JOIN sys_menu p LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu m ON p.`id` = m.menuId ON me.`id` = p.`parentId` WHERE me.`hidden` = 0 AND p.`hidden` = 0 GROUP BY p.`id` ORDER BY me.`sort`, p.`sort` ASC

SELECT CONCAT(me.`id`, 10000) AS id, me.`name` AS name, me.`url` AS url, me.`path` AS path, me.`css`, me.`createTime` AS createTime, m.id AS pId, m.`name` AS pName, m.`permission` AS pUrl FROM sys_menu me JOIN sys_permission m ON me.`id` = m.`menuId`
